website_summaries.verdict: The perfect way to dress up your gift table or entryway.
pros: Blue and gray color scheme works beautifully together
Set includes 2 banners, 4 paper lanterns, 4 honeycomb balls, and 6 honeycomb fans in various sizes
cons: This kit sits at a slightly higher price point, but the quality justifies the cost

customer_reviews.title: Great Outcome!!
customer_reviews.text: First package was missing items such as elephant garland and latex balloons etc. I needed the items ASAP! The seller shipped me another order and had it delivered the next business day and asked I return the shipment with missing items!! Everything is exactly as described!! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Linda C.

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: This package is worth every cent, plus some. Everything comes flat, but assembles in no time. The banners are prestrung (huge time-saver) and the package includes extra string to hang the lanterns and globes (so thoughtful! saved me a trip to the store!). The balloons can be blown up as usual or filled with helium. No need to run out for anything. These decorations are really tasteful - just the right touch to transform the space to make it truly festive. All my guests were delighted, especially the expectant parents!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The party wasn’t until after the return window and I did not try to blow the balloons before the party. Every balloon pooped while blowing up with barely any helium in them. I had to them go purchase balloons from the dollar tree that worked way better. The elephants I only record one strand. Also I only recieved blue and white latex balloons. If I was still in the window of return I would not keep This product. I should have stuck with dollar tree purchases it would have been better on our end.
customer_reviews.author: Chasity

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is great and good quality. You do need to set aside an hour to put it all together but worth it
customer_reviews.author: Mary Janssen

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Loved all the items you recieve in this package. It was just what I was looking for to add to the decorations for the Baby Shower I threw for my sister in law.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with Balloons
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything except the balloons. I had them inflated the morning of my shower and by the end of it, they were floating low and still slowly deflating. All the other decorations were great and were a nice addition to my shower. I wouldn’t waste my time or money with using their balloons. Get them elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Christy M Korpal

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a quick baby shower surprise to arrange in a small space. Nice pack for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Fun decorations
customer_reviews.text: These were fun decorations for a baby shower. The attached strings were definitely helpful for hanging the decorations.

customer_reviews.title: Great value 👍
customer_reviews.text: Great product and value. The decorations were perfect. The colors were a lovely muted blue, silver and pewter colors. Everyone at the party was impressed with the decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Loved all the decorations that came with it. Great price for all the items. The picture I took was just the banner. But the whole set up was nice.

customer_reviews.text: All othe decorations were all quality, hung nicely. Wish it included a few balloons but other than that really really liked.

customer_reviews.title: Very lovely

I did not give it five stars due to the following: one lantern had a small rip in it and one white lantern had brown stains on it. Not sure what they were, but on white very visible. Still was able to use everything without anybody noticing the flaws.

product_meta.title: RainMeadow Premium Baby Shower Decorations for Boy Kit | It's A BOY | Garland Bunting Banner, Paper Lanterns, Honeycomb Balls | Tissue Paper Fans | Blue Grey White | Elephant Style
feature_bullets: 🐘 IT'S A BOY BABY SHOWER! – A great joy is coming all wrapped in blue! Excited to meet the new little gentleman soon? We've teamed up this pretty set with some of the most popular matching blue, grey and white decorations to help you create a complete & stylish look of your Baby Shower!

💙 🐘 PACKAGE INCLUDES –  “IT’S A BOY” and “BABY SHOWER” Banners (Pre-Strung) | 4 Paper Lanterns 8”| 4 Honeycomb Balls 8”| 6 Honeycomb Fans – 3x 10”, 3x  6”| 24 Elephants Garland | 2 Foil Star Balloons | 12 Latex & Confetti Balloons | Instructions

🐘 HASSLE-FREE & TIME-SAVING – You don’t have to be a DIY expert to use these decorations and to spend hours assembling everything. We have selected the most beautiful and easy to assemble baby shower decorations for you (No Pom Poms! No torn tissue! No Hassle! Hurray!). Each item needs seconds to be ready for hanging! You will really enjoy this easy, quick and fun activity! And you will be pleasantly surprised by the final magical result!

💙 IDEAS FOR USE – Hang the decorations at the entry to let everyone know where the party is; Display them at the front of the gift table; Hang them over the head table for great photo ops; Style a fun photo booth for great party pics with a banner and decorations in the background; Create a magical atmosphere hanging them between the trees or across aisles!
🐘 100% GUARANTEE – Love it or your money back, no questions asked

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars264 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
